price: 78.Tokkel koroositeh yan mara gibdi Baaxóh angoyyi ken tibbixeeh ken geyte, Tokkel usun sinni dabooqah addal Rabte Baruugay guluubah tanih maacisen.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
